column4: Hey I just installed linux on this machine as a dual boot with XP, but every time I try to boot up, after seeing that "Kernel Active" text for a second, I just get a black screen.  Does anyone know what's going wrong?
your ubuntu install just went over windows.
no I'm on windows right now, I mean when I try to boot ubuntu it doesn't work
ohhh
thats beyond me, hope someone else in the chan can help :)
me?
you mean which version of ubuntu?
whichever is newest... I just downloaded the iso like an hour ago
no
well that should tell you something right there =b
well when it didn't work, scguy318 told me to dl the text based alternate cd
so I did that and installed with that
does it have something to do with me running dual screens?
intel quad core extreme core 2 processsor
yeah 8800 GTX
holy crap
dual 19 in LCD
yeah i installed scguy, i get the same problem when trying to boot the install
that is a beast of a machine
mobo is nforce 680i
thx :)
